Title: Relates to enforcement of immunization requirements; repealer
Summary: Removes kindergarten, elementary, intermediate and secondary schools from enforcement of immunization requirements.
LawCode: Rpld §613 sub 2, §2164 subs 6, 8-a & 11, amd §2164, Pub Health L; rpld §914 subs 2 & 3, amd §914, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the education law, in relation to removing schools from participation in immunization enforcement; and repealing certain provisions of such laws relating thereto
